'''Iansan''' is a playable {{Electro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Iansan is a fitness instructor and [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] Champion Mentor from the [[Collective of Plenty]]. She bears the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name|UWZ|'''Uwezo'''|bearer=1}}.
